meta.title: About Modulary
meta.description: Learn how Modulary helps coaches, trainers, and creators build their own apps without code

hero.label: Our Story
hero.description: We believe every coach, trainer, and creator deserves their own platform. Modulary makes it possible to unify your courses, clients, and content in one branded app—without writing a single line of code.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize app creation. We're putting the power of custom software in the hands of those who need it most—the experts who transform lives every day.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where professionals can focus on what they do best—coaching, teaching, healing—while their technology works seamlessly in the background.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Simplicity over complexity. Your success is our success. We build tools that just work, so you can focus on your clients.

team.label: The Team
team.title: Built by Creators, for Creators
team.description: We've been in your shoes. Our team combines tech expertise with real experience in coaching and content creation.

cta.title: Ready to Unify Your Workflow?
cta.description: Join thousands of coaches and creators who stopped juggling tools and started thriving.
